text: Love, Sitara () is an Hindi-language drama movie directed by Vandana Kataria. Made by Ronnie Screwvala under RSVP Movies, it stars Sobhita Dhulipala and Rajeev Siddhartha. The movie was released on ZEE5 on 27 September 2024. It deals with the complexities of modern relationships, dysfunctional families and what it takes to overcome uncomfortable truths. == Cast == * Sobhita Dhulipala as Sitara * Rajeev Siddhartha as Arjun * Sonali Kulkarni as Hema Chechi * B. Jayashree as Amumma * Virginia Rodrigues as Latha * Sanjay Bhutiani as Govind * Tamara Dsouza as Anjali * Rijul Ray as Majeed == Production == The movie was announced in June 2021.Principal photography started by February 2020. It was delayed until November 2020 due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The movie was mainly shot in Mumbai and Kerela before wrapping in December 2020. == Music == == Release == In September 2020, it was announced that the movie was heading for a streaming release on an OTT platform in 2021. It premiered on ZEE5 on 27 September 2024. == Reception == Shubhra Gupta of The Indian Express and Sukanya Verma of Rediff.com gave it out of 5 stars. Shilajit Mitra for The Hindu and Rishabh Suri for Hindustan Times reviewed the movie. == References == ==Other websites== * * Love Sitara on ZEE5 Category:2024 drama movies Category:2020s Indian movies
title: Love, Sitara
